channel.title: internetnews.com
channel.description: Real time breaking news, analysis, features and opinion for IT decision-makers. Focus includes Enterprise, Developer, Security, Storage, Wireless, eCommerce and Policy.

item.title: ADV: Sun's new breakthrough server
item.description: Sun's new server maximizes capacity with dramatic energy efficiency and costs savings. The Sun Fire* Solaris T1000 server delivers more compute threads using significantly less power.

item.title: House Panel Moves on Data Breach Bill
item.description: With data breaches back in the news, national legislation begins to percolate.

item.title: Vonage IPO Hits Market Turbulence
item.description: VoIP company hopes to raise $531M to help fund expansion and pay off debts.

item.title: Rough Start For Google's Summer of Code '06
item.description: We regret to inform you that the acceptance letter we sent you for the program...was wrong.

item.title: Sycamore Hit With SEC Probe
item.description: Networking company the latest firm involved in stock option investigation.

item.title: Google: Resistance is Futile
item.description: Reporter's Notebook: Search giant's laser focus has always been on 'collective computing.'

item.title: Symantec-Microsoft Suit Casts Pall on Vista
item.description: Analysis: Symantec's suit is a gauntlet for Microsoft and a threat to Vista, but analysts expect a resolution.

item.title: HP Does the VTL Limbo
item.description: HP unveils a virtual tape offering that sells for a bit over $6,000, bringing VTL technology within reach of SMBs.

item.title: South Korea Rejects Microsoft's Appeal
item.description: High Court the last option before August deadline.

item.title: Leaked Docs Claim AT&T Aided NSA
item.description: Smoking Gun? New statements purport to be part of whistleblower's sealed evidence in EFF lawsuit against AT&T.

item.title: StreamCast Takes Legal Aim at eBay's Skype
item.description: The amended lawsuit is seeking a global injunction on marketing and sales.
